def_cn: (与形容词连用)表示“有…性格(或态度、意见等)的”
def_en: -minded combines with adjectives to form words that describe someone's character, attitude, opinions, or intelligence.

def_cn: (与副词连用构成形容词)表示“对…感兴趣的”，“有…头脑的”
def_en: -minded combines with adverbs to form adjectives that indicate that someone is interested in a particular subject or is able to think in a particular way.

def_cn: (与名词连用构成形容词)表示“一心想…的”，“满脑子是…的”
def_en: -minded combines with nouns to form adjectives that indicate that someone thinks a particular thing is important or cares a lot about it.
